component_baseline.description: Legitimate parts have low entropy (controlled manufacturing), counterfeits have high entropy (random properties)

rework_detection.description: Rework should decrease entropy. If entropy increases, degradation detected.

supply_chain_compression.description: Legitimate supply chains compress well (predictable). Fraudulent chains don't (random).

counterfeit_detection.description: 15% entropy deviation from baseline signals counterfeit (from Grok research)

conservation.description: |Î”S| must be < 0.01 every cycle for entropy conservation

meta.source: Grok Research - $700M+ NASA losses, 15% DoD fake semiconductors
